 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹבָב‎</span> **proper name, masculine** (compare Phoenician proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חב‎</span>; [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii, 171. 217</sup> suggests comparison with <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***serpent***) — son of Reuel, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹתֵן‎</span> of Moses (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חתן‎</span>), [[Num.10.29|Num 10:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.4.11|Judg 4:11]] insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> probably also [[Judg.1.16|Judg 1:16]], see [[BDB#GFM|GFM]].
